entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle early in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of showers. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
